title: To the no less vertuous than ingenious Mris Mary More upon her sending Sir Thomas More's picture (of her own drawing) to the long gallery at the public schools in Oxon.
author: Whitehall, Robert, 1625-1685.
notes: Place of printing from Madan; dated at end: Xbris 26, 1674.
Ornamental border at head of leaf includes arms of the Order of the Garter.
Copy annotated in MS. at end of text, "R. double U.", and at foot of leaf: "[W.]hithall, E Coll. Merton".
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford.
